p: In Asteraceae, EOs are biosynthesized and accumulated in various secretory structures, such as idioblast oil cells, oil cavities, secretory ducts, and glandular trichomes [ 46]. In Baccharis, EOs can be found in roots, stems, leaves and flowers [ 35, 47, 48], and are stored in secretory ducts and glandular trichomes [ 4].
